Articles.Content:
Hello, I've been trying to build an Apollo-like Lunar Rover.. is there anyone out there already?

I'm using this mod which adds the covered wheels:

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/223256-munar-rover-wheel

Thanks.

You might consider installing infernal robotics and making one yourself. 

My try at it last year yielded a compact folding rover that fitted well within the space of a quad structural panel. Only thing is you can't mimic the folding seats.  Kind cool otherwise.  Sadly I deleted it. 

Edited February 11, 2016 by Wallygator
